description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, has been found in infinitietech taskhub 2.8.7. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /home/get_tasks_list of the component GET Parameter Handler. The manipulation of the argument project/status/user_id/sort/search leads to sql injection. VDB-239798 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
